patthana9.5:5.1: Nahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:5.2: Nahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:5.3: Nahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana9.5:6.1: Nanahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:6.2: Nanahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:6.3: Nanahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana9.5:7.1: Nahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:7.2: Nahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:7.3: Nahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:9.1: Nahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:9.2: Nahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:9.3: Nahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana9.5:10.1: Nanahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:10.2: Nanahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:10.3: Nanahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana9.5:11.1: Nahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:11.2: Nahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:11.3: Nahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:14.1: Nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nanahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana9.5:14.2: Nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana9.5:14.3: Nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa ca nanahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana9.5:15.1: Nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana9.5:16.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava … pe … upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava, vippayutte pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana9.5:17.1: Nahetuṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:18.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye kamme … pe … magge ekaṃ, vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekaṃ.
